name: Filmi Detective
description:
Detective Homelock Shers needs your help to embark on this quest which will test your knowledge about movies as well as your analytical & logical skills. 

Each level of this game is a Cryptogram (a puzzle that consists of a short piece of encrypted text). It's a hidden Movie Quote which needs to be guessed in order to complete the level.

Yellow tile means it needs to be replaced with correct letter.
Grey tile is already established as correct letter.
Green tile suggests your assumption about correct letter. It can either be right or wrong, but you hardly go wrong, don't you?
Red tile shows that guessed letter is wrong one. 

Keyboard has alphabets to pick correct guesses. White alphabets are available & blue ones are already used. Keyboard has reveal help & reveal mistakes options which can help you throughout the level but those will cost hints. You can clear any unwanted letters or reset the level in case you are stuck. 

There are almost 2000+ best Movie Quotes from English, Hindi & Marathi movies. If you ever liked a decent Movie Quote, it is highly likely that you will encounter it as one of the levels while playing this game.

Game tutorial video is made available which shows game-play for first 3 levels in English movie category. Please note that for first 3 levels no hints will be deducted. Use as much hints as you like. 

Let us know how you feel about the game by rating it on Play-store. Reviews help us to improve further. If you have any suggestions/corrections or you would like your favorite Movie Quote to be added in the game, just write back to us. Hope you enjoy playing the Filmi Detective.
